name: Javad Nouri
body:
# ### Welcome to my GitHub Page.
You can find several projects I have worked on over the past years which are publicly available on my [github profile](https://github.com/qaflan).  
Some other related projects that are publicly available but are not [yet] on github:
* Implementation of the "Consistent morphological evaluation package" published in  
Javad Nouri and Roman Yangarber. "[A Novel Evaluation Method for Morphological Segmentation](http://www.lrec-conf.org/proceedings/lrec2016/summaries/255.html)”. In: Proceedings of LREC 2016: the Tenth International Conference on Language Resources and Evaluation. Portorož, Slovenia, 2016. isbn: 978-2-9517408-9-1.  
The python implementation can be downloaded from [here](http://nlp.cs.helsinki.fi/morpho/morpho-consistent-eval-package-1.1.tar.gz).
* Etymology modelling suite: more information can be found on the [project page](http://etymon.cs.helsinki.fi).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
